abstract: Volkswagen has made an official offer for MAN of Germany, in a deal that values the company at about $20 billion and would create Europe’s largest truck manufacturer.
snippet: Volkswagen has made an official offer for MAN of Germany, in a deal that values the company at about $20 billion and would create Europe’s largest truck manufacturer.
lead_paragraph: Volkswagen on Tuesday made a formal offer for MAN of Germany in a deal that would create the largest truck manufacturer in Europe.

headline.main: Volkswagen Makes Formal Bid for Truck Maker
